text: Timothy Milford "Tim" Babcock (October 27, 1919 - April 7, 2015) was an American politician. He was the 16th Governor of the U.S. state of Montana. He served as Governor from 1962 to 1969. Babcock was born in Littlefork, Minnesota on October 27, 1919. He graduated from Dawson County High School in 1939. He married Betty Lee on September 21, 1941, and they had two children. Babcock was married to Betty Lee from 1941 until her death in 2013. Babcock died in Helena, Montana, aged 95.Former Montana Gov. title: Tim M. Babcock
